p: A sample of 500 grams of air-dried coarsely powdered, using a Thomas Scientific Model 4 Wiley mill, aerial parts with a particle size <0.5 mm, obtained by RETSCH test sieves with round hole, were placed in the distiller. Distillation with a continuous flow of water vapor (near to 100 Â°C due to the altitude) was stopped after 40 minutes when it was observed that successive readings of the volume of oil remained constant.
